Human Exposure to radio frequency
=================================

by [website](https://fke.utm.my/author/website/ "Posts by website")
 | Feb 12, 2020 | [Faculty](https://fke.utm.my/category/faculty/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/EMF-2020-with-hrdf-logo-1-scaled-1-980x1386.jpg)

2020: ITU COE International Training on “Human Exposure to Radio Frequency Electromagnetic Fields” is calling for participations.

HRDF claimable for local participants.

Limited seats available.

Interactive lectures, live demonstrations and group activities to learn about health & safety , international guidelines and local policies on human exposure to RF EMF from base stations mobile and wearable devices.

Find out more at [https://bit.ly/2vmD5bn](https://bit.ly/2vmD5bn?fbclid=IwAR3TGk7cZkE_Z0isXF5HAJlDkiGg9b49ED5-EyjNx9R2pY6MB1-NiAcQwik)

Register at [https://bit.ly/2tIWUcB](https://bit.ly/2tIWUcB?fbclid=IwAR1e3WWQ1DgBabzuDSHA3k5Xn0ESRDaI4DOBdRgP8gVhvJPr0fvI9yYuDYc)
